body.name: Bedsure Bed Pillows Queen Size Set of 2 - Luxury Hotel Pillows for Back, Stomach or Side Sleeper, Soft and Fluffy Gusseted Pillow with Down Alternative, Machine Washable(Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 13 hrs 19 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Optimal Support】With dense and thick filling, these pillows queen size provide high resilience and optimal support for your head and neck. Whether you're a back, stomach, or side sleeper, Bedsure bed pillows offer comfort for you throughout the night.

【Soft and Breathable】Our queen pillows are filled with super-fine fiber, which features a lower denier for higher softness and a 3-dimensional hollow structure for enhanced breathability. The brushed microfiber cover offers a smooth and soft hand feel, ensuring a peaceful sleep without any crinkly noise.
【Stylish Design】The exquisite Greek Key pattern on the pillow infuses a touch of classic elegance into your room. It's also a perfect gift for your family and friends to improve their sleep quality.
【Certified for Safety】 This bed pillow queen set of 2 is Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX certified for meeting the highest testing criteria for harmful chemicals and has been found harmless for humans.

【Easy to Care】Please gently fluff the queen size pillow and let it rest for up to 48 hours after taking it out of the box to ensure maximum volume. This fluffy and soft pillow is machine washable. Simply wash it in cold water on a gentle cycle and tumble dry low.

【Warm Tips】For long-distance shipping purposes, Bedsure pillow sets are vacuum-compressed packages. Please allow several hours for the pillow to regain its fluffiness after unpacking. Don't forget to contact us if you have any questions！

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes yes yes
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my RV. Fell in love . They are fluffy and thick, BUT .. sink to a very useable depth. I brought them in the house to use when we returned from our trip.. will definitely purchase more love them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are fluffy
reviews.reviewText: I love fluffy everything in the winter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They are okay
reviews.reviewText: I read tons of reviews before I purchased these. They are soft and don’t flatten but I feel they are to soft for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I fell in absolute love with these pillows! The price is amazing & are so worth the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fluffed up after removing from packaging and let sit for few hours, fluffed up again before putting in pillow protectors. Bought for grandchildren and they are holding their shape and firmness (for what I wanted). Love these, will order again and I do recommend these pillows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as great as I was hoping for...
reviews.reviewText: These pillows turned out to be a little awkward and uncomfortable for me. They're very firm, and yet somehow also overly plush. I felt like it put my head at a really awkward angle. They may work well for you, but they didn't work well for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Totally loved them. They are fluffy, comfy & soft. Excellent quality.
